sentences.sContent: Do believe there is no best man, only much suitable one.
sentences.sContent_eng: Do believe there is no best man, only much suitable one.
sentences.sCn: 要相信没有最好的男人，只有更适合的。

sentences.sContent: Freddie was Keith's best man and his friends Eric, Billy, and Andrew were the groomsmen.
sentences.sContent_eng: Freddie was Keith's best man and his friends Eric, Billy, and Andrew were the groomsmen.
sentences.sCn: 弗雷迪是基斯的伴郎，他的朋友埃里克，比利，安德鲁是男傧相。

trans.tranOther: the man who helps the  bridegroom  at a wedding ceremony
